title: Minecraft Java版 18w21a 发布
author: what_name
txt_content:
本帖最后由 what_name 于 2018-5-24 22:31 编辑 

每周快照是Minecraft的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。  然而，每周快照主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。 适用于正式版的Mod不兼容快照，且大多数Mod都不对每周快照提供支持。 Minecraft 1.13 仍未发布，18w21a为其第38个预览版。 转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。
MINECRAFT SNAPSHOT 18W21AA Minecraft Java Edition SnapshotJava版1.13快照 18W21A

Wednesday snapshots are best snapshots!周三的快照是最好的快照!

CHANGES IN 18W21A18W21A中的修改

Dolphins no longer wear armor海豚不能穿上盔甲了Dolphins will now help you find treasures海豚会指引你寻找宝藏Lerp线性插值Fixed some bugs修复了一些BUG

FIXED BUGS IN 18W21A18W21A中修复的BUGMC-52974 - Host's skin not visible to other players when in LAN局域网主机的皮肤无法被局域网中其他的玩家看见MC-72866 - Item shading inside item frames does not account物品框中旋转过的物品阴影方向错误MC-97196 - /spreadplayers shows wrong error message / large number in error message when no entities were spread/spreadplayers指令在没有实体被随机扩散时会显示大量错误信息MC-105139 - Entity head rotation not interpolating on Yaw axis实体头部的Y方向旋转没有插值MC-123199 - Lighting renders incorrectly on item frames oriented vertically垂直方向上物品展示框照明不正确MC-123454 - Dispenser using spawn egg spawns mob too high发射器使用刷怪蛋时生成过高MC-123455 - Using spawn egg spawns mob too high on the water and lava刷怪蛋在水上或熔岩上使用时生成过高MC-123598 - Fence top missing texture when below fence gate栅栏门下方的栅栏顶部没有材质MC-123769 - Some item names that previously had colors doesn't have colors anymore一些物品的物品名称没有标注颜色MC-124954 - Jungle temple redstone wire is not connected丛林神殿的红石没有连接MC-125377 - Structures from old worlds don't regenerate if opened with 1.13 standalone client/server旧版本世界的结构如果用1.13的客户端/服务器打开不会生成MC-126086 - Salmon and tropical fish hitbox on land is wrongly positioned陆地上的鲑鱼和热带鱼的碰撞箱错位MC-126863 - Sounds made with water in spectator mode观察者模式会在水下发出声音MC-127116 - When placing a wall using /setblock without specifying a block state, it is invisible; default state has up=false默认方块状态中up=falseMC-127333 - Carpet and panes don't show the right colors on maps地毯和玻璃板在地图上没有显示正确的颜色MC-127586 - Mobs do not suffocate in double slabs实体不会在双台阶中窒息MC-127996 - Bone meal can be put on floating water骨粉可以对流水施用（且其产生的海草会替换流水为水源）MC-128139 - Sea grass generates water source when placed on flowing water在流水中放置海草将会产生水源MC-128251 - Grass and mycelium can spread to dirt blocks which are submerged under general water草方块和菌丝可以蔓延到淹没在水中的泥土上MC-128493 - Dolphins can wear armor海豚可以穿上盔甲MC-129058 - Dolphins become permanent (can't despawn) after playing with an item海豚在和物品嬉戏后不会自然消失MC-129708 - Armor slot icons are backwards盔甲槽的图标反了MC-129808 - "demo.day.6" does not include the keybinding correctly文本"demo.day.6"未正确包含按键绑定信息MC-129849 - Upgrade from 1.6.4 destroys world, spams errors将1.6.4的世界更新至最新版本将会损坏世界
